FuncDef: This command enables the context to configure the BGP EVPN MPLS parameters. In VPLS, either instance BGP 1 or BGP 2 can be configured, but not both simultaneously in the same service. Epipe services only support instance 1. If thebgpbgpparameter is not specified, the instance is set to 1.

ParaDef.Info: Indicates the bgp instance identifier. Values-1, 2.
